skills.name: Attack
skills.extra:
3 different attacks based on the amount of 'Rev Up' used (max 3)
1: +10 Base Damage
2: Additional Type Damage (based on weapon)
3: Hits an additional time. (If original target is dead, randomly selects one.)

name: Burning Wizard
note: Seems to constantly be ablaze no matter what.

skills.name: Fireball
skills.extra: Flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, this skill attacks one more time (max 7 times). Extra attacks do not apply additional Burn count.

skills.name: Immolation
skills.extra: Cannot be used until 'Fireball' has been used atleast 2 times, and 'Flame Strike' has been used atleast once. Cannot be used again until 'Flaming Sphere' has been used. Buffs attack power and crit chance for the rest of the fight.

skills.name: Cauterise
skills.extra: Remove all status effects. Heal self for 10-20 HP. Applies static 5/5 Burn on self.

skills.name: Flaming Sphere
skills.extra: Usable once after an immolation has been used.

skills.name: Scorching Ray
skills.extra: Must use 'Flaming Sphere' atleast 2 times before using this. Bypasses defense.

skills.name: Bleeding Edge
skills.extra: Chance to apply 'Boredom'

skills.name: Make Hay
skills.extra: Small chance to apply 'Boredom' on self

skills.name: Performance Review
skills.extra: Heals self by 5-10 HP, buffs attack power and accuracy by 10% and has a smaller chance to inflict 'Boredom' on self.

skills.name: Backburner
skills.extra: Increased chance to apply 'Boredom' on self.

skills.name: Blue Sky Thinking
skills.extra: Only usable when in 'Boredom' state. Can only be used once per unit. Sets the target's 'CORP' resistance to 'FATAL' (2). Chance to apply 'Boredom'.

name: Manager
behaviour: When in 'Overtime', uses new skills for the duration of the effect.

skills.name: Touch Base
skills.extra: Reduces the target's Bleed Resistance by 0.1

skills.name: Deep Dive
skills.extra: Raises self Attack Power by 0.2. Raises self Defense by 0.1. Small chance to apply 'Boredom'. Enters 'Overtime' for 3 turns (+1 per use).

skills.name: Brain Dump
skills.extra: Usable when in 'Overtime'. Great chance to apply 'Boredom'. If missed, raise self Accuracy by 0.1. If dodged, reduce target's Dodge by 0.02. On hit, raise target's MINM Res. by 0.02.

skills.name: Game Changer
skills.extra: Usable when in 'Overtime'. Ignores target Defense.

skills.name: Rain Check
skills.extra: Usable when in 'Overtime'. Summons a weakened Pepsi-Co Employee (All TYPE Res. raised by 0.75, Defense set to 2, Health set to 75) (Max 1). If Pepsi-Co Employee is already on the field, use 'Leverage' instead.

skills.name: Leverage
skills.extra: Kill Remaining Ally to buff self. Heal HP by (Remaining Ally HP) x 0.6. If self Accuracy is < 1, raise to 1.1. Lower self Defense by 0.1. Reduce 'Deep Dive' Cooldown by 1. Reduce all Status Effect Res. by 0.3.

name: Lucia
behaviour: Always uses 'Warning Shot' as the first skill.

skills.name: Warning Shot
skills.extra: Inflicts Wary (acc&atk down, dodge slightly up) guaranteed for 3 turns. Does not consume any of Lucia's ammo.

skills.name: Reload
skills.extra: Returns ammo to 6, cannot dodge for the turn. Small chance to be rolled for use the turn after reloading, triggering Snake Eyes if that happens.

skills.name: Snake Eyes
skills.extra: Grants Snake Eyes to self (Buffs next 1 ammo move, dodge raised to 0.4, attack power lowered to 0.9 and acc mod raised to 1.3 while unspent)

skills.name: Fire!
skills.extra: Consumes 1 ammo, adds 8 bleed potency and 1 count while Lucia has Snake Eyes.

skills.name: Precise Shot
skills.extra: Consumes 1 ammo, base damage goes up to 55, doubled crit chance and consumes an extra ammo with Snake Eyes.

skills.name: Precise Shot (Tempo Up)
skills.extra: First shot has a small chance to inflict Incapacitated (mild all stats down) Has a higher crit chance than normal.

skills.name: Fan The Hammer
skills.extra: Wastes all her ammo and deals multihit equal to ammo used. Reduced crit chance.

skills.name: Fan The Hammer (Tempo Up)
skills.extra: Every missed shot has a small chance to inflict Tensed up (Defense up, acc&attack&dodge down.), reduced burn chance.

skills.name: Tipped Stabs
skills.extra: Reduced chance to inflict debuffs on each individual hit. She will use this when at low or no ammo

skills.name: Up The Tempo!
skills.extra: Lucia will always use this move once she hits 30% hp. During Snake Eyes, her defense spikes down to 0.8, dodge becomes 0, attack power becomes 1.3, accuracy mod becomes 1, all resistances become 1.1 and she can no longer gain Snake Eyes. Ammo is set to a fixed 4. Fan the hammer and Precise Shot gain new properties.

name: Big Scary Bear
note: My friend 'Violet' was terrified of this thing. I don't know why.

skills.name: Claws At You
skills.extra: This attack deals 0 damage against targets that aren't 'flowerssmoke' or 'Violet'.

name: Sword Descent Hooligan
behaviour: Always uses 'Draw Blade' as the first skill. Crits deal 2.5x more damage instead of 2x.

skills.name: Draw Blade
skills.extra: Raise Base Damage by 5 for every 10 Bleed Potency on target.

skills.name: Acupuncture
skills.extra: Increase Crit Chance of this skill by 0.04 for every 10 Bleed Potency on target.

skills.name: Slay
skills.extra: Raises target's Defense by 0.1 for this Skill.

name: Master Jim
behaviour: Always uses 'Draw Blade' as the first skill. Crits deal 3x more damage instead of 2x. Uses 'Sword Descent Technique 3: Take Your Bones' every 3 turns. After recovering from Paralysis, recover 10 HP and set Defense back to 0.9 (+0.1 per recovery)

skills.name: Draw Blade
skills.extra: Raise Base Damage by 5 for every 10 Bleed Potency on target.

skills.name: Sword Descent Technique 1: Puncture
skills.extra: Increase Crit Chance of this skill by 0.04 for every 8 Bleed Potency on target.

skills.name: Sword Descent Technique 2: Slay
skills.extra: Raises target's Defense by 0.2 for this Skill.

skills.name: Sword Descent Technique 3: Take Your Bones
skills.extra: If hit during this turn, use 'Sanguine Floret Blossom' next turn.

skills.name: Sanguine Floret Blossom
skills.extra: This Skill cannot Crit. Raise target's Defense by 0.1 for this Skill. Become Paralysed and set self Defense to 0.5 for a turn after this Skill. If there are 'Sword Descent' Allies, raise their Attack Power by 0.25.

skills.name: Horde
skills.extra: Summons a weakened 'Sewer Rat' if there are none in battle.

skills.name: Contamination
skills.extra: If Allies are present, attack them instead. Otherrwise, attack Jane and modify this Skill to apply 20/5 Poison and 10/5 Bleed. If hit Ally, deal 50% less Base Damage and heal 10-15 HP.

name: Prospector
behaviour: Starting from the first turn, every 3 turns uses 'Gold! There's Gold!

skills.name: Gold! There's Gold!
skills.extra: Turns 1-3 of Jane's Skills into Gold. Gold Skills cannot be used.

name: Fortune Teller
note: Suddenly, one day, my stats had changed.
behaviour: Cannot 'Murder', upon interaction assigns you a tarot card that will affect your stats. One-time use.

name: King in Pepsi
behaviour: Once HP reaches below a certain threshold, enter 'Overtime' state permanently.

skills.name: Corporate Greed
skills.extra: If Jane has >15 Copper, this attack does 50% less damage and takes 15 Copper from Jane. If Copper was taken, buffs self Attack Power by 0.15 and self Accuracy by 0.1. If in 'Overtime' state, also summon a weakened 'Pepsi-Co Employee'.
